parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns client state in network game. Works on both, client and dedicated server. The following states are possible:

{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable"
! [[getClientStateNumber]]
! [[getClientState]]
! Description
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 0 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "NONE" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> No client (or singleplayer)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 1 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "CREATED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Client is created
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 2 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "CONNECTED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Client is connected to server, message formats are registered
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 3 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "LOGGED IN" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Identity is created
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 4 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "MISSION SELECTED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template>Mission is selected
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 5 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "MISSION ASKED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Server was asked to send / not send mission
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 6 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "ROLE ASSIGNED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Role was assigned (and confirmed)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 7 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "MISSION RECEIVED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Mission received
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 8 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "GAME LOADED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Island loaded, vehicles received
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 9 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "BRIEFING SHOWN" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Briefing was displayed
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 10 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "BRIEFING READ" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Ready to play mission
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 11 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "GAME FINISHED" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Game was finished
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 12 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> "DEBRIEFING READ" <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> Debriefing read, ready to continue with next mission
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getClientStateNumber]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Client state (see table above)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_state = [[getClientStateNumber]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_inGame = [[getClientStateNumber]] > 8;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getClientState]], [[getPlayerUID]]
</value></part></template></root>
